algorithm_technique: Geometric median approximation using Weiszfeld's algorithm or ternary search.
Iterative refinement of the center point.
problem_summary_simple: Find a point on a 2D map to minimize the sum of Euclidean distances to all customers.
problem_summary_technical: Approximates the geometric median using iterative methods (like Weiszfeld's algorithm or ternary search) to minimize the sum of Euclidean distances.
key_insights: The problem asks for the geometric median, which minimizes the sum of Euclidean distances.
Unlike Manhattan distance, the geometric median doesn't have a simple closed-form solution and requires iterative approximation.
Ternary search or Weiszfeld's algorithm are common approaches to find the geometric median.
